name: Gulpman
overview: Gulpman is a small man that you must guide around one of a selection of mazes eating fruit. Once a level is clear of fruit, you start again only everything is a bit faster. Four nasty faces are on your tail and must be avoided at all costs, or they rob you of one of your lives. However, you do have a limited number of laser blasts which when activated fire out in all four directions around Gulpman, sending any nasty face they touch back to its starting corner.
